title: Trudeau warns Canada faces a serious third wave of Covid-19 cases as officials toughen lockdown measures
content:
1. Trudeau warns Canada faces a serious third wave of Covid-19 cases as officials toughen lockdown measures  CNN
  2. Dr. Isaac Bogoch breaks down the COVID-19 situation in Ontario ahead of Premier Ford's announcement  CTV News
  3. New Ontario restrictions: Stay-at-home order extended, police given extra powers to 'strongly enforce' rules  Yahoo News
  4. Ontario extends stay-at-home order, restricts interprovincial travel as province loses battle against COVID-19  CTV Toronto
  5. Randall Denley: Doug Ford gives Ontario police-state tactics instead of COVID measures that actually work  National Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: トルドー首相、カナダは深刻なコヴィド-19感染の第3波に直面していると警告、当局はロックダウン対策を強化
特鲁多警告加拿大面临严重的第三波科维德-19案件，官员加强封锁措施。
特魯多警告加拿大面臨嚴重的第三波科維德-19案件，官員加強封鎖措施。
